permissions: Admins can update equipment movement trips. Non-admins can update trips for brokers they are a member of.
side_effects: Updates the equipment movement trip; after save it updates the related customer cost allocation and propagates job number and explicit driver day mobilization before minutes to the job production plan when present.
validation_notes: The trip ID argument is required and at least one updatable field flag must be provided. trailer-classification can be set to an empty string to clear; when provided it must be a heavy equipment transport classification. trailer-classification-equivalent-ids require trailer-classification to be set, cannot include the trailer-classification itself, must reference existing trailer classifications, and each must be a heavy equipment transport. service-type-unit-of-measure-ids cannot be blank and must reference existing service type unit of measures; the server ensures at least one quantifiable STUOM is present. explicit-driver-day-mobilization-before-minutes must be a non-negative number when provided.

flags.name: --trailer-classification
flags.validation: Use empty string to clear. When provided, must be a heavy equipment transport trailer classification.

flags.name: --trailer-classification-equivalent-ids
flags.description: Trailer classification equivalent IDs (comma-separated or repeated).
flags.validation: IDs must be integers and refer to existing heavy equipment transport trailer classifications (example: 10,12).

flags.name: --service-type-unit-of-measure-ids
flags.description: Service type unit of measure IDs (comma-separated or repeated).
flags.validation: IDs must be integers and refer to existing service type unit of measures.
